website_summaries.verdict: This set of massage stones heats up very quickly in the waterless heating system provided.
pros: Comes with a warmer to quickly heat up stones
Zenstone heats stones to 130 degrees F in just 11 minutes
This set is lightweight enough to be taken anywhere
Stones keep their heat for a long time

website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for modern therapy on the go with heated stones in less than 15 minutes.
pros: No water is needed, minimizing mess and clean up
Reviewers appreciate the limestone rock, indicating they heat faster and also retain heat for professional and self massage
cons: Must use oil with the limestone product

customer_reviews.title: Worksgreat
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. As a massage therapist who despised doing hot stone massage, this set makes the modality a pleasure. I have two complaints though. One the ugly neon green color. I’m sure it goes with nobody’s decor. Two and this is a big one for me. It is creaky every time you open and close it. I have tried to put oil and WD40 to reduce the squeaking but to no avail. It’s distracting to the person on the table to keep opening and closing the cover. Does the company have any ideas on how reduce the squeak?
customer_reviews.author: MAK3211

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based on another review. He nailed it. Heats quickly, stays hot. I've bad this open for 4hrs while on and the stones reheat perfectly. Cleanup is super simple. Best addition to my massage practice for the $$!
customer_reviews.author: Doug N

customer_reviews.title: Romantic stay at home nights have gotten even better😉
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about buying this and spending what I did on it. Im glad I did. The unit worked great, the rocks stayed hot/warm for a good amount of time, and my husband lo ed his first ever massage. He wont let anyone else touch his back because of past injuries so I did my best and he loved it! We will be using this again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Stones will scratch your skin
customer_reviews.text: These are not smooth stones. They are rounds cut from a larger block and are rough like sandpaper and scratch the skin. Even oiled and with oil they were scratchy. Why bother making a kit with sandpaper like stones?!
customer_reviews.author: k wilson

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly and hot!
customer_reviews.text: These are better than the small clamshell stone warmers at the massage studio where I am working. They heat quickly and at a higher temp so may need to allow to cool off a bit before use on clients. I find them perfect. The stones retain their heat for a long time. The smaller clamshells don’t seem to heat quickly enough or get hot enough so they end up cooling off too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: M Renee

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for mobile/travel business or personal home use
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about trying this but it was the best option I had found for portable waterless stone units. So far, I love it! My clients love it! The color is very limey green but i didn’t care, the unit itself I cared about and this works great. Stones can get too hot if left in there too long though.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Warm not hot stones
customer_reviews.text: The kit is smaller than it looks. The stones will need “seasoning” as they arrived dusty. They get warm but not as hot as traditional basalt stones. It does have a longer cord, which is good. It is a simple system for warming the body but not a true hot stone treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Peggy Giron

customer_reviews.title: Almost junk, but not quite
customer_reviews.text: I've used hot stones for years, and this set is two steps above junk. Plastic clamshell exterior, PLASTIC!!!, small, thin stones, not totally smooth (though they still feel nice on the skin, they don't feel that nice in my hands)... just really not that great. Returning, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Zen Stone set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hot stone set almost a year ago and they have been awesome. I had just started my own practice and the office space I got wasn't going to allow for a typical hot stone roaster set up. I thought about the salt stones but opted for these because they were easy for me to afford. I'm very pleased with them! They heat up quickly, are easy to clean and look cute on my table. I have had a lot of compliments from my clients on them too. I highly recommend;)
customer_reviews.author: SarahJ

customer_reviews.title: Love Zenstones!
customer_reviews.text: I just used my Zenstone set for a masssge and I love them! Heated up quickly, stayed perfect temperature and no water to clean up! Hoping they will have additional stones to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Heats quick but wish was bigger
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little bigger to hold more stones as I like to use more stones during a massage but it is nice that don't have to use water like used to and heats stones quick (about 10min) but you have to use the flat stones from zenstone
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S.

customer_reviews.title: Best hot stones ever
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and hold heat pretty well. The box says they heat up in 10 mins, but I have found that it usually takes 15-20 mins to reach the heat you want. So keep that in mind when timing your session
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: Heats stones fast
customer_reviews.text: I am a massage therapist and use this on my clients. I like that the warmer is small and waterless. Heats stones nicely and Fast! Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Lety

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy but works good.
customer_reviews.text: The clam shell looks great but it won’t open by itself and then it squeaks. You can’t use it in the room because if the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T. Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing !!!!!!! I’m so happy I made the choice to purchase this item. The hot stones heat up very fast and they retain their heat. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Look Henk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very quick to heat and easy to clean. Perfectly manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: teacher4ever

customer_reviews.title: Makes hot stone easy
customer_reviews.text: The shell heats up in 10 minutes , the stones are perfect temperature, the shell closed is cool to the touch . No water required so it’s portable and easy to use. I showed it to class mates and teachers everyone was impressed .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Salim

customer_reviews.title: Heats fast, holds heat long
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for use in my massage practice. They are not used for a full hot stone massage (I think they’d be fine). We use them more as tools or for a hot stone finish. They have a little more grip to them and are not as smooth as regular stones. Just use a little extra oil. No clients have ever complained. Easy to clean and store. It would be nice if they offered a double set.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Hot Stone Happiness
customer_reviews.text: Never have enjoyed giving hot stone massages until I purchased this! No more putting your hands in hot water or retrieving stones out of hot water. Plus it’s super easy to clean & you can easily put the stones back in to reheat!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Collins

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a therapist friend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend who is a massage therapist. Upon inspection it looked like a good product. Haven't heard anything negative from her so can only assume all is well.
customer_reviews.author: S. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Nice stones!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She is a massage therapist . She approves, she says they are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Schnepper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These work great. It heats wonderfully. Im very happy with these stones and warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Pep

customer_reviews.title: Hot Stone Relaxation
customer_reviews.text: The stones heat up quickly and retain heat for quite a while. My husband uses these on his back and he loves them. I use them every once in a while, when my muscles need relaxing. Pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Necessary

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for a On-call Massage Therapist
customer_reviews.text: Great product to purchase! Makes Hot Stone Massage super easy. They heat up quickly. They are perfect for in-office use as well as for on-call massage therapist. Great over-all product.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Davis

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: The wife loves the convenience and ease of use and cleaning with these stones in a shell.
customer_reviews.author: ajcwood

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Love!! As a mobile LMT, I take these everywhere I go-especially in the winter time! They heat up quickly and maintain warmth with out getting too hot. I definitely recommend these for home use or on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product!
customer_reviews.text: It can also heat larger stones. It does the job well. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: pearlsofwisdomforourdaughters

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a spa setting. Heats up quick and is easy to clean. Absolutely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shannon caesar

customer_reviews.title: These stones feel amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this. It's so awesome not having to deal with the water version. All clients are so happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It delivers as promised
customer_reviews.text: Product stays hot for an adequate time frame for massage. Quick start and the stones are excellent for glide and short heat retention.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Heats up in 10-15min. Easily carried to different rooms. Made my money back working in a spa as an employee in a month using this for upgrades. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: joel p.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the traveling therapist that wants to offer hot stone therapy for their clients.
customer_reviews.author: Nina B Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Worked for less than a year, now it's dead
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this was a good buy, but it only lasted 10.5 months. It has been used intermittently over the months. I bought it Sept 2019 and now (8/2020) it doesn't heat up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Great ease of use
customer_reviews.text: I like the portableness of this stone warmer— it is light and compact. It heats quickly and comes with quality flat stones that I enjoy working with. The stones hold heat well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Allen

customer_reviews.title: Hot Rocks are very helpful for relief.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. My clients like it. Its fells great
customer_reviews.author: Ivette Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it works for professional...
customer_reviews.text: They are cute, but doesn't look professional as I thought. And dont keep the heat as long as I read.
customer_reviews.author: Vivyvu

customer_reviews.title: This set is great. It heats up quickly
customer_reviews.text: This set is great. It heats up quickly. The stones are very warm to start with, but are easy to handle especially for massaging to start with and then placing on bod.. I really like the small amount of space they take. The case is a bit bright, and would love to have had it in a soothing neutral color - black, white, chocolate, but that's the only negative.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, glad there’s no water to mess with
customer_reviews.text: Works great, glad there’s no water to mess with. Heats up within mins. Wish it Can in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: jlu_express

customer_reviews.title: ... in the mail today and so far it works pretty well. Heats up rocks fast
customer_reviews.text: I received this product in the mail today and so far it works pretty well. Heats up rocks fast. The rocks don't hold heat for an extremely long time because the rocks are thinner but still really nice. This is NOT the color I thought it was got to be. It says spa green and photos like like a sea foam green but this is neon green! Lol isn't going to look amazing in my room but oh well if it continues to work well I'll be happy
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY way to do hot stone massage!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a massage therapist for 13 years and have always refused to do hot stone massages. The old warmers are bulky, hard to clean, too hot, make the room hot & humid, and just generally a pain the the butt. But I love doing hot stone with this set. If I'm doing a full body stone I place a strip of aluminum foil in the warmer so I dont have to deal with an oily warmer. This gets the stones to the perfect temperature; hot but not scalding. The room doesn't heat up and clean up is a breeze. Now I want a set for my home office to bbn use on family and myself!
customer_reviews.author: cmhincomo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY compact, heats very well . Reccommend
customer_reviews.text: LOVELOVELOVE THIS SET. Inuse for neck ache and migraines. I also purcjase an arnica oil that i use with it and am cery pleased with
customer_reviews.author: CathleenC

customer_reviews.title: I thought the stones would be smoother
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of a hot stone massage in my home as needed, but not sure this product is the same as a professional would use. The stones are very porous and it seems to take a lot of oil for a short time massaging a small area. The stones stay warm, but the longer you leave them in the case turned on, the hotter they get; Very hot!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Z

customer_reviews.title: Better than I Was Expecting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help my wife with her stressful job, I was thinking it was going to be fairly cheap as professional warmers are designed very differently, to my surprise though this was AWESOME! We had a great experience the first time we used them, and the massage lotion/oils wash off quite easily.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a warm relaxing muscle massage on yourself or ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for use at home. They heat up fast and get very hot. Great for a warm relaxing muscle massage on yourself or others. Easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This a great alternative to soaking stones. Easy to clean, hearts up fast, portable, and adds a great value to my practice.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stone Warmer for massage therapists!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is small and I keep it packed in my bag every time I have a massage
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Love them. Need 2 sets to do a full stone massage plus a set of toe stones and your all set.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful price, lightweight set and heats up in less than 15 min. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Olichka

product_meta.title: ZENSTONE Pro Waterless System + 12 Gravity Hot Stones (2018)
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL - Beware low-quality imitations being sold under major brands that may short-circuit or cause burns
RAPID + WATERLESS - Fast and convenient, no water required. Ready in ten minutes.
12 GRAVITY STONES INCLUDED - Made from a special rock variety designed to heat up quick and hold heat longer
PATENTED TECH - HeatSHIELD outer casing protects you from high heat generated by the system
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Keep your Zen. We guarantee our products.
